analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave appāni ca iva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjāni

original: Paṁsukūlaṁ, bhikkhave, cīvarānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave cīvarānaṃ appañca sulabhañca tañca anavajja

original: Piṇḍiyālopo, bhikkhave, bhojanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: piṇḍiyā lopaḥ bhikkhave bhojanānam sulabham ca tat ca anavajja

original: Rukkhamūlaṁ, bhikkhave, senāsanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave senāsanānam appañca sulabhañca tat ca anavajja

original: Pūtimuttaṁ, bhikkhave, bhesajjānaṁ appañca sulabhañca tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhave bhesajjānam sulabham ca tat ca anavajja

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri appāni ca iva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjāni

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭho hoti sulabhena ca anavajjena ca, idamassāhaṁ aññataraṁ sāmaññaṅganti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭhaḥ hoti sulabhena ca anavajjena ca idam assa aham aññataram sāmaññaṅganti vadāmi iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
